page.title: 06Employment in Bilbrough
page.content:
Employment in Bilbrough in 1985.
There is little employment in Bilbrough except at the school and the pub.There are 3 farmers,who employ a few farmworkers.More than half of the villagers are retired, and the others are mainly commuters.These include 7 teachers, 2 solicitors, 3 surveyors, an architect, sales representatives and brewery administrative staff.Many of the women work as part_time clerical assistants. The arts are represented by 3 professional singers and a fashion model. Most young people go away to college or university,when they leave school. The rest usually find work in York or Tadcaster before moving away.
